map.message: $(string.map_D3D12ResourceHeapTypeImmutable Heap: Placed Resource (many placed resources can be immutably joined with a fully created heap))
$(string.map_D3D12ResourceHeapTypeReserved Resource: Page-mapped to one or more heaps, or nothing at all.)
$(string.map_D3D12ResourceHeapTypeImmutable Resource: Placed texture on a reserved buffer which is page-mapped to one or more heaps, or nothing at all.)
